----- Original Message -----
From: "James Trahern" <4idlamo@...>
To: <gladiator@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, June 22, 2002 6:12 AM
Subject: [gladiator] Read gladiator_story.rtf or else!


> Ok. maybe i didnt get the message across in my last message. That, or
gladiator@yahoogroups.com deleted the subliminal message i embedded within
the thread.
> PLEASE visit my webpage. PLEASE read gladiator_story.rtf. failure to do so
will result in a gang of blood-thirsty orcs coming into your house, howling
at your dog, and eating the corpses you have stashed in your basement.
> A big part of writing this is to get positive feedback from other people
reading it. If i don't get feedback, i kind of lack the incentive needed to
continue writing. I was hoping for some big appreciation from 'Triad' and
Dancing Corpse after finishing chapter 6/7. Also, getting some feedback from
the big man upstairs (Tom Ricket of course) would be cool also.
>
> -Zjack
